entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
